    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Armbands of Athleticism](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3057)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 285 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armbands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Skilled awl work has imprinted images of a muscled weightlifter into these tiered leather bands, which grant you enhanced stamina and skill when performing athletic exercises. While fastened to your upper arms, the armbands give you a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks. In addition, whenever you use an action to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) and you succeed at the Athletics check, add a +5-foot item bonus to the distance you move.

</column>

The bonus to Athletics checks is +3, and the bonus to a successful check to Climb or Swim is +10 feet.
